# Chwarzno, Kościerzyna County

Chwarzno  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Stara Kiszewa, within Kościerzyna County, Pomeranian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  south-east of Stara Kiszewa,  south-east of Kościerzyna, and  south-west of the regional capital Gdańsk.
For details of the history of the region, see History of Pomerania.
